review: This little thing is awesome.  For $35 its worth it now, but it will be included in upcoming AndroidTV boxes/sets, so...whatever, its $35.  The hardware is weak so don't expect smooth transitions or anything, and it only supports h.264 so not every local file is supported, but again, its $35.  If you have a decent tablet/phone its the easiest way to "smarten" your TV.
